metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13339 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions before13.2.10, 13.3.7 and 13.4.2: XSS in SVG File Preview. Overall impact islimited due to the current user only being impacted.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
